page.title: 10INDUSTRY AND BUSINESS.
page.content: {STEEL ENGINEERING.} Started in 1971 for plant hire. Customers' requests for repairs and steel fabrication led to expansion of this work and the cessation in 1978 of the plant hire activity. Present work force of 30. {HEAVY PLANT HIRE.} Started in 1969 for plant hire/sale. Machines are hired with or without operators. Building, Civil Engineering Contractors and Local Authorities are serviced throughout East Anglia. Present workforce of 33. { BUSINESS EXAMPLES (OFTEN HOME BASED) Accountant,Solicitor,Builders(4),shop, Artist/Stage designer,Electrician, Miller(2),Farm Secretarial Service,Sub Contract Digger Driver,Plumber,Painter Decorator,Trailer Hire,Horse Grooming, Nurseryman,Insurance Broker. Various wholesalers,retailers,agents etc.
